Friction.docstring:
Calculates the force of kinetic friction (fk) acting between two surfaces in relative motion [cite: 242][cite_start].

Parameters:
    coefficient_of_kinetic_friction (float): The coefficient of kinetic friction (μk) (unitless) [cite: 244][cite_start].
    normal_force (float): The normal force (N) exerted between the surfaces in Newtons (N)[cite: 242].

Returns:
    float: The kinetic friction force (fk) in Newtons (N).
Friction.python_code:
def calculate_kinetic_friction(coefficient_of_kinetic_friction: float, normal_force: float) -> float:
    return coefficient_of_kinetic_friction * normal_force

Friction.docstring:
Calculates the maximum (limiting) force of static friction (fs_max) that can exist between two surfaces before motion begins [cite: 248][cite_start].

Parameters:
    coefficient_of_static_friction (float): The coefficient of static friction (μs) (unitless).
    normal_force (float): The normal force (N) exerted between the surfaces in Newtons (N)[cite: 248].

Returns:
    float: The maximum static friction force (fs_max) in Newtons (N).
Friction.python_code:
def calculate_max_static_friction(coefficient_of_static_friction: float, normal_force: float) -> float:
    return coefficient_of_static_friction * normal_force
